T01TD1139E:100b-1: tri ratna mam ga la sto dram /
T01TD1139E:101a-1: mchog gsum la bkra shis kyi bstod pa /
T01TD1139E:101a-2: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1139E:101a-3: thub pa rab tu dag pa'i gser zhun mdog 'dra 'dom gang 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can //
T01TD1139E:101a-4: pad+ma rgyas 'dra'i spyan mnga' zhal ras zla 'dra dbu skra bung ba'i mdog lta bu //
T01TD1139E:101a-5: tshangs pa brgya byin ku be ra dang bdud kyi cod pan pad+ma'i zhabs gtugs pa //
T01TD1139E:101a-6: sangs rgyas nyi ma shin tu dri med dam chos 'od zer 'byung la phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1139E:101a-7: shin tu che ba'i sangs rgyas nyi ma rigs pa'i 'od zer 'phro ba de nyid las //
T01TD1139E:101a-8: dam pa'i chos kyi 'od zer gang dag rnam par 'phros pas phyogs kun gsal mdzad cing //
T01TD1139E:101a-9: gang gis 'jig rten rgyun du gnyid kyis log pa 'di dag yang dag sad mdzad pa //
T01TD1139E:101a-10: gang zhig rtogs pas thub rnams zhi bar gshegs pa'i dam chos de la phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1139E:101a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i 'od zer de dag nyid kyis rgyas mdzad grags pa gang //
T01TD1139E:101a-12: thos pa'i rdzing bu tshul khrims dri zhim byang chub yan lag rnams kyi sdong bu mdzes //
T01TD1139E:101a-13: bsam gtan gzugs med dag gi chu bsil rnam dag mya ngan 'das pa'i snying po bzang //
T01TD1139E:101a-14: sa steng dge 'dun pad+ma'i tshal rgyas dag la gus pas legs par mchod phyag 'tshal //
T01TD1139E:101a-15: dkon mchog gsum la bkra shis kyi bstod pa slob dpon ma tri tsi tas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T01TD1139E:101a-17: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi dy'a ka ra sim ha pra bha dang /
T01TD1139E:101a-18: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bande dpal brtsegs rakshi tas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
